description:
1166 is a psychological horror game following six people in Salem, Massachusetts and how their lives change when one of them is kidnappedâ€¦.

Fight through pain, depression, and grotesque monsters to uncover the truth. The darkness has taken a hold, will you see the light or hide in the shadows? Or will you find another way? Will you slaughter everything in your path, or take a more passive approach? The choice is yours...

Made by a one man (and two cats) development team, this dark mystery has simple artwork, keyboard and mouse controls, compelling multiple endings and original music.
